infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to take a QR code of the admission ticket or photoes of non-ID card holder.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires photo library access to check the QR codes or photoes you took properly. and make sure students are appropriate students.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app requires photo library access to check the QR codes or photoes you took properly. and make sure students are appropriate students.
